title: South Korea Ski & Golf Resort with Private 27-Hole Golf Course
description: Whether you're an avid skier or a keen golfer, Holiday Inn Resort Alpensia Pyeongchang, an IHG Hotel, provides the perfect base to enjoy the great outdoors year-round. Spend time out on the green at Alpensia 700 Golf Club - a private 27-hole course - or don your snow gear and tackle the slopes at Ski 700. After building up an appetite, head over to Mont Blanc and fill up on mouthwatering Korean dishes with an international twist, or savour Korean-style BBQ in the resort garden in summer.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Alpensia Pyeongchang, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 325 Solbong-ro, Daegwallyeong-myeon, Pyeongchang-gun, Gangwon-do 25351, South Korea

title: Sophisticated South Korea Alpine Retreat in Alpensia Winter Olympic Resort Town
description: Discover alpine serenity in the heart of South Korea’s spectacular Taebaek Mountains with a serene stay at InterContinental Alpensia Pyeongchang Resort, an IHG Hotel. The site of 2018's Winter Olympics, Alpensia resort town’s dazzling entertainment and dining options guarantee the ultimate ski escape. Enjoy intimate dining at Oxy Lounge, golfing at Alpensia 700 Golf Club or savour time spent wandering through the beautiful Sol Seom gardens.
location_description: InterContinental Alpensia Pyeongchang Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 325 Solbong-ro, Daegwallyeong-myeon, Pyeongchang-gun, Gangwon-do, Solbong-ro, 25351 South Korea
